long description: All roaming outgoing calls(Local and STD) @60 paisa/Min -- Applicable only onto Idea Network --
Unlimited Local I2I Night Calling (Timing-12 AM to 6 AM) --
Unlimited Local I2I Night Calling (Timing-12 AM to 6 AM) --
Home outgoing call tariffs while Roaming on Idea network. Roam Local / STD calls will be charged at Home Local / STD rates ( including benefits of Home STV Rate cutter / Unlimited packs) --

Unlimited Idea local/STD mobile calls --  Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs. 0.10P/Min  --

Unlimited Local/STD Calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable in Case 296 & Rs. 0.10P/Min in case of MRP 244/396/496/796/996/449/299 --

Unlimited Local/STD Mobile Calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable in Case 347 & Rs. 0.10P/Min in case of MRP 147 --
